item.title: Dire Straits - Walk of Life - Key of F
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Walk Of Life - Dire Straits
Using the chords: Bb C F
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum) with some single strums
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Dire Straits - Sultans of Swing - Key of Dm
item.description: Chords: Dm, C, F, B-flat, A Strum pattern - Included in the video Go to this video to practice the Riff with Quick Changes!!!: https://youtu.be/DfZEcfxpsW0
